titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the continuing of farthing-tokens
Proclamations. 1617-03-17
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobaldes, the seuenteenth day of March, in the fourteenth yeere of our raigne ..
The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
In this edition line 1 of text ends "at".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
